attributes.action: Stop the witch hunt against British soldiers. lnvestigate Pl Laywers.
attributes.background: This witch hunt is costing the tax payer dear, as well as causing worry and distress to soldiers already cleared of any wrong doings. Only the lawyers are profitting from this exercise. They are just ambulance chasers looking to make a profit.

rejection.details:
You could start a new petition explaining more clearly what action you would like to see. Or you may wish to sign one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/118038
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/117448
